content: the cheap trick jumper is a crochet pattern that uses us terms and is size inclusive xs to 5xl please note that by getting this product you are not getting a sweater but a pattern of a sweater it is not a finished product material yarn size 6 super chunky 10 00mm hook sewing needle and stitch markers yardage xsmall 630m small 760m medium 840m large 915m xlarge 990m 2xlarge 1000m 3xlarge 1050m 4xlarge 1150m 5xlarge 1225m ©all rights reserved to @les terribles please note that this pattern is for personal use only you may not sell the finished product this pattern or any parts of it are not to be shared translated sold published reproduced as any form of tutorial including video or claimed as your own
